topic.title: A little help please
topic.body: I keen getting, "Connection with UiServer Websocket was lost. Reconnecting." A few days agin (like when I first landed here) it happened in occasion. Now it's happening a lot. Tor is enabled for Tor sites, I am NOT on a VPN.

topic.title: ZeroNet Trackers?
topic.body:
I run dnsmasq on my macbook pro. When I fire up ZN I see these DNS lookups:

Sep 4 15:37:26 tracker.coppersurfer.tk 
Sep 4 15:37:26 amigacity.xyz 
Sep 4 15:37:26 tracker01.loveapp.com 
Sep 4 15:37:26 open.acgnxtracker.com 
Sep 4 15:37:26 open.trackerlist.xyz 

Seems.... not correct.

topic.title: URL shortener?

1565185775_1CBZY3cuYKeHZXEeHVxRFLmsCr3Um.body:
Some folks seem to think ZN is just sharing browser cache. It just ain't so. I've got a bunch of ZN graphics stored on my machine that I've never clicked. 

I posted a graphic to one of the boards and the ZN app told me it was sending that graphic to 5 peers. Those peers now have the graphic on their machines and they never clicked on it. 

See pee is going to be the big issue with ZN. I have no idea how to deal with it.

> [theosis](#comment_11_149W17bFN1NbQou6iE81Uq2b8wEvyqwUV1): That's not how it works. All known imageboards use optional files. ZN app told you it sent update to your JSON data file. The actual files are not posted by default, they are only downloaded from your machine when someone views them.

But if I go offline my graphics have to be posted somewhere else in order to be available right?

So they have to be on another machine.

Not arguing. Trying to understand. I have this model in my mind and it might be the wrong.

@theosis and @anshorei:

Thanks for setting me straight. Much appreciated.

> [theosis](#comment_14_149W17bFN1NbQou6iE81Uq2b8wEvyqwUV1): No problem, feel free to message me on ZeroMail if you need something else.

I am having issues sending to your ID on ZM. Very sad.

Anyway, my last question for today is: I should have a machine that is always available if I host content *or* if I select "help distribute files" correct?

1566642594_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2.body: Must not be quite ready for the MacOS version of ZN. I get 'please update ZeroNet' which I update from the menu but the error persists.

> [gitcenter](#comment_791_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): Probably. You should have a Py3 version of ZeroNet, i.e. v0.7.0.

I show version 6.5.0 and that I am up to date. Oh well, we can add this issue to the current knowledge base :-)

> [gitcenter](#comment_792_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): 6.5.0 is the last Py2 version. There's no easy way to update from Py2 to Py3, so it can't give you an update button. You'll have to build ZeroNet from source, that's rather easy.

That was easy and it did work.

> [gitcenter](#comment_792_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): 6.5.0 is the last Py2 version. There's no easy way to update from Py2 to Py3, so it can't give you an update button. You'll have to build ZeroNet from source, that's rather easy.

The instructions I used to built .07.0 on MacOS Mohave (a little different than Linux):

Do this all with a standard user account. brew does not like running as root.

wget https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/archive/py3/ZeroNet-py3.tar.gz
tar xvpfz ZeroNet-py3.tar.gz
cd ZeroNet-py3

Install brew from https://brew.sh
 -- /usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"

Add /usr/local/bin to your path if you don't already have it since that's where brew puts executables..

Do the python stuff
 -- brew install python3
 -- python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt

Start Zeronet:
 -- python3 zeronet.py

I've had Covid and it wasn't bad for me. Not sure why I'd want to get the vaccine. If you think I'd do it to protect someone else from getting sick you are mistaken.

In Italy we Will vaccinate these people later because Very often they have antibodies and se dont have a Great amount of doses. Anyway the most covid infections dont give any syntom. Covid is Dangerous in the Little % of people that have pneumonia or severe organ failure. The problem is that this virus spread Very fast and infect a Great Number of people and because of this Also a Little % of severe infections cannot be managed by hospitals because of the great numbers.

> [anonysan](#comment_8_1EFJrmyV7WP3gw71XG1CRCWvVY2TMp4Pna): those vaccines work NOTHING like the COVID "vaccine" and you know it, stop bullshitting

I had to look it up. This is from a New York Post article https://nypost.com/article/how-do-covid-19-vaccines-differ/

How it works: Specially manufactured mRNA, or genetic material, is injected into cells, directing the body to create a tiny amount of coronavirus spike proteins. The body’s immune system responds by making antibodies to the proteins, which protect the person if they’re exposed to COVID-19 down the road. This type of messenger RNA vaccine has never been approved for humans.

Tetanus, smallpox, and polio vaccinations are all weakened versions of the disease. Source: CDC
I will be claiming a religious exception.

This from WSJ.com (paywalled):

Administering Covid-19 vaccines comes with a valuable perk for retail pharmacies: access to troves of consumer data.

Chains such as CVS Health Corp., Walmart Inc. and Walgreens-Boots Alliance, Inc. are collecting data from millions of customers as they sign up for shots, enrolling them in patient systems and having recipients register customer profiles.

The retailers say they are using the information to promote their stores and services, tailor marketing and keep in touch with consumers. The companies also say the information is critical in streamlining vaccinations and improving record-keeping, while ensuring only qualified people are receiving shots.

“Every one of these customers is coming through our digital front end, so we have their email, we have their text message, and we have the ability to communicate with them regularly,” said Jonathan Roberts, CVS chief operating officer.
